attributes.action: Abolish Parliament, Politicians Return Power to Crown and have Direct Consultation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the Undersigned call upon the
 Prime Minister to Abolish Parliament
 which serves Politicians not ordinary
 People and Politicians who more often
 than not cannot be Trusted.

 Let Loyalty reside in the Crown and
 the People Express their Views via
 Freedom of Speech and Press and 
 Direct Consultation Referendums upon
 Important Issues
